title: Sleeping.Dogs.Definitive.Edition.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Game information:  


Sleeping Dogs Definitive Edition is a re-release of the acclaimed action Sleeping Dogs,
released on PC, Xbox 360, PS3 in 2012! Sleeping Dogs Definitive Edition includes 24 additions!
Improved gameplay, added a lot of nice little things, but the schedule has reached the level
of a new generation of games.

Welcome to Hong Kong, a city in which the flickering light of neon lights intertwined with
everyday life, the city, whose exotic locales and seething streets hide one of the most
powerful and dangerous criminal organizations in the world - the Triads.

In this open-world game you have to try on the role of Wei Shen, a police undercover,
who is trying to destroy the Triad gangs from the inside. Prove its significance on the
way to the tops of the organization, taking part in violent criminal operations, and do
not let the criminals to reveal themselves.

Torn between loyalty to the police icon and gangster code of honor, you have to put everything
on the line and not get lost in the blurry boundaries between truth, loyalty and justice.



Game Features:  

Includes all 24 DLC, released since the first release of the game in 2012.

Explosive action, flavored with a mixture of nuclear lethal martial arts,
hot shootings and violent clashes.

Mad Adrenaline: pierce the streets and tear of the sea with the help of a
huge fleet of exotic cars, sport bikes and speedboats.

Hong Kong - your personal playground: participate in illegal races,
bid in cockfights or relax in the karaoke. In areas of the city are
countless ways to have fun.


RePack Features:  

Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition
Do not cut / recoded
